The '''White Downs''' were a range of chalk downs in the [[Westfarthing]] of [[the Shire]]. [[Michel Delving]], the chief town of the Shire, was located there.<ref>{{FR|Part}}</ref> Every seven years the [[Free Fair]] was held on the White Downs at [[Lithe]], during which the [[Mayor of Michel Delving]] was elected.<ref>{{FR|Ordering}}</ref>
